This is a testharness.js-based test.
PASS Test that the PresentationRequest.start() with one URL requires user gesture. 
PASS Test that the PresentationRequest.start() with multiple URLs requires user gesture. 
PASS Test that navigator.presentation.defaultRequest.onconnectionavailable with one URL isn't reset after gc(). 
PASS Test that navigator.presentation.defaultRequest.onconnectionavailable with multiple URLs isn't reset after gc(). 
PASS Test that the PresentationRequest.getAvailability() returns same promise object. 
Harness: the test ran to completion.
